resources.string: I am Nahid Hasan. I am a student of Software Engineering department in Daffodil International University. I admitted here in 2014. Now I am in 3rd year according to date May 23,2016.I am a simple man. I like to lead a measurable life. I am come from a mid level family of a village. My father is a school teacher. So I have to struggle with my life to live.
In y childhood my hobby is collecting forieg money. But now, I have a new hobby that collecting modern and new computer gadgets.
My aim in life is to be a pharmacist. But this is change for my luck. But now I am very happy and comfort feel for that.
